gcci.text: H100 price at $3.34/hr signals tightening supply yet sustained capex is stabilizing chip availability for large‑scale deployments.

gtpi.text: Token input cost at $1.30/1M is being driven down by fierce API price wars, pushing providers to improve model efficiency and competitiveness.

gagl.text: Annual electricity load of 180 TWh is straining regional grids, prompting accelerated adoption of nuclear baseload to curb carbon emissions.

aipi.text: Overall AI sector sentiment remains cautiously bullish, yet escalating hardware and energy expenditures raise bubble‑risk concerns about long‑term growth sustainability.
